head.title: Important COVID-19 Notice - Parents - Cityscape Schools

meta.name: description
meta.content: Cityscape Schools exists to work in an educational partnership with families. We desire to provide a distinctive environment of educational opportunity for all children and young people in our community.

'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js'; var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s); })();

br.span: On Friday, April 17, 2020, Governor Greg Abbott announced the closure of all Texas schools for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year, which ends May 27th, 2020, due to ongoing safety concerns surrounding COVID-19. In accordance with the governor’s order, all Cityscape campuses will remain closed and all school events are canceled for the remainder of the school year.

Please know that while our East Grand and Buckner Preparatory campuses are closed, school is not canceled. We are committed to at-home learning for the remainder of the school year and attending to the health, safety, and wellness needs of our students and staff.

div.span: Cityscape will continue to serve thousands of Grab-and-Go meals on Wednesdays between 10:00 a.m. and 1 p.m. These meals are comprised of seven breakfasts and seven lunches and are for all children in the community (18 years of age or younger). Meals will be distributed at three locations:

br.span: Since COVID-19 first impacted North Texas, our administrators, teachers, and staff have worked tirelessly to launch meaningful access to at home learning across the district each week. Our students will always remain our number one priority. Thank you to our staff and parents for their work, support, concern, and patience during these challenging times.

hr.style: color: #211650; font-size: 17.6px; font-family: 'Libre Franklin', sans-serif; text-align: left

div.div:
Update | Grab & Go Meals (Monday, April 6th)
Dear Cityscape Families:
Like many schools districts in Texas, starting April 15 Cityscape Schools will only be distributing meals on Wednesday's between 10 a.m. and 1 p.m. The service times may be shortened if all food is distributed as meals will be available while supplies last.
In the table below, you can see the dates that we will be distributing meals as well as the number of meals that will be provided.
Update | Grab & Go Meals (Effective Monday, March 30th) Dear Cityscape Faculty and Staff:
On behalf of Mr. David Tecuatl, Chief Operations Officer, we will changing the meal distributions to Mondays and Thursdays.
According to the National School Program Lunch, we can only provide meals to cover the days we had planned to be open during the school year. For that reason, weekends and holidays will not be covered. We have 4 scheduled holidays for the reminder of the year: April 10, April 13, May 1 and 25.
The service times may be shortened if all food is distributed as meals will be available while supplies last.
Please see attached flyer and further details will be on the website. This decision was made to ensure the safety of our staff, parents and students.

hr.style: color: #211650; font-size: 17.6px; font-family: 'Libre Franklin', sans-serif; text-align: left

div.div:
Yesterday evening, a shelter-in-place order was issued for Dallas County. School operations are an essential function and Cityscape will continue to perform these two essential functions:
Free Grab and Go meals for all children 18 years and under. Monday – Friday (Friday there will be 6 meals for the weekend) at these locations
East Grand Preparatory, 6211 East Grand Ave., Dallas, TX 75223
Buckner Preparatory, 8510 Military Parkway, Dallas, TX 75227
City Church, 1530 Carroll Ave., Dallas, TX 75204
The instructional team is rolling-out an at-home Instruction model for your children. Please continue to go to cityscapeschools.org for more updates and information.
All essential Cityscape personnel will be practicing six-feet social distancing and all other methods of personal hygiene as ordered by the Dallas county order. Further guidance will be provided to each of you, as we all stand united and together during this pandemic.

Your children are our first concern. We are here for you and your children. Cityscape loves your children and your families. Cityscape is family. Please keep your family safe and follow the Dallas county order.
Changing Cityscapes one Child at a Time,

hr.style: color: #211650; font-size: 17.6px; font-family: 'Libre Franklin', sans-serif; text-align: left
hr.div:
Ayer por la tarde, el condado de Dallas activó una orden de permanecer en casa. Las operaciones escolares son una función esencial y Cityscape continuará cumpliendo estás funciones
Distribución de comida para niños y jóvenes menores a 18 años. Lunes a viernes (el viernes se darán 6 comidas para el fin de semana) en los siguientes puntos de distribución.
East Grand Preparatory, 6211 East Grand Ave., Dallas, TX 75223
Buckner Preparatory, 8510 Military Parkway, Dallas, TX 75227
City Church, 1530 Carroll Ave., Dallas, TX 75204
El equipo académico está por lanzar un modelo de instrucción en casa para sus hijos. Por favor continúe visitando cityscapeschools.org para más información
Todo el personal esencial tendrá que seguir la lineamientos de 6 pies de distanciamiento social y métodos de higiene como fueron ordenados por el condado de Dallas. Pronto recibirán más información, mientras permanecemos unidos durante esta pandemia.

Sus hijos son nuestra principal preocupación. Estamos aquí para usted y sus hijos. Cityscape ama a sus hijos y a sus familias. Cityscape es una familia. Por favor manténgase seguro y siga las órdenes del condado de Dallas.
Changing Cityscapes one Child at a Time,

hr.style: color: #211650; font-size: 17.6px; font-family: 'Libre Franklin', sans-serif; text-align: left

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto
display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto

hr.style: color: #211650; font-size: 17.6px; font-family: 'Libre Franklin', sans-serif; text-align: left

span.strong: Cityscape Schools (East Grand Preparatory and Buckner Preparatory) is closed until further notice to help slow the spread of Coronavirus.

div.div: To slow the spread of the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in our community, all Cityscape School (East Grand Preparatory and Bucker Preparatory) will close until further notice. This action follows advice from the Dallas County Health and Human Services department (DCHHS). We recognize the significant impact this extended closure will have on the entire community, especially for families who depend on the district for critical services. While our classrooms are empty, our work on behalf of children continues. We have activated at-home learning, our teachers are prepared to begin distance instruction, and Cityscape Schools will distribute meals at both campus locations beginning Monday, March 23rd. Each campus will become central locations for family and student resource distribution in the coming weeks. Please expect phone messages, texts, and all other communication channels with updates.
Thank you for working with us as we unite with organizations across the community to respond to COVID-19.

strong.em: Cityscape Schools (East Grand Preparatory y Buckner Preparatory) cerrará hasta nuevo aviso para ayudar a reducir la propagación del coronavirus.

span.em: En un esfuerzo por disminuir la propagación del coronavirus (COVID-19) en nuestra comunidad, Cityscape Schools cerrará hasta nuevo aviso todos sus campus (East Grand Preparatory y Buckner Preparatory). Esta acción sigue la recomendación el Departamento de Salud y Servicios Humanos del condado de Dallas (DCHHS).
Reconocemos que esta medida tendrá un impacto significativo en toda nuestra comunidad, especialmente para las familias que dependen de los servicios críticos del distrito.

Mientras nuestros salones están vacíos, nuestro trabajo en favor de los estudiantes continua. Hemos activado el “Aprendizaje en casa”, nuestros maestros se están preparando para iniciar instrucción a distancia; y Cityscape Schools distribuirá comida en ambos campus empezando el lunes 23 de marzo. Cada campus será el lugar central para la distribución de recursos escolares y familiares en las siguientes semanas. Estaremos enviando comunicación vía telefónica, textos, y otros medios.
Por favor visite https://www.cityscapeschools.org/apps/pages/important-COVID-19-notice para más información.
Gracias por su apoyo mientras nos unimos con organizaciones en nuestra comunidad para responder al

hr.style: color: #211650; font-size: 17.6px; font-family: 'Libre Franklin', sans-serif; text-align: left

div.br: Due to the March 11, 2020 announcement by the World Health Organization that the outbreak of the new coronavirus has been declared a pandemic, updated announcements by the Centers for Disease Control (CDC) and information from medical professionals and state and federal health officials, the following action is being taken in an attempt to minimize health and safety risks to the Cityscape Family community. As a precaution, we will be extending spring break by one week. Schools will remain closed Monday, March 16 through Friday, March 27. The district will continue to monitor and evaluate the situation prior to reopening school on Monday, March 30, and will communicate across all channels as updated information becomes available.

br.em: Debido al anuncio del 11 de marzo, de la Organización Mundial de la Salud, declarando el Coronavirus como pandemia, actualizaciones del Centro de Control de Enfermedades, información de médicos profesionales y oficiales de salud estatales y federales; se ha tomado la siguiente acción en un intento de minimizar riesgos de salud a la comunidad de Cityscape Schools. Como precaución, estaremos extendiendo el Spring Break una semana extra. Las escuelas permanecerán cerradas del lunes 16 de marzo al viernes 27 de marzo. El distrito continuará monitoreando y evaluará la situación antes de reabrir el lunes 30 de marzo usando todos nuestros canales de comunicación cuando tengamos información actualizada.

hr.style: color: #211650; font-size: 17.6px; font-family: 'Libre Franklin', sans-serif; text-align: left

div.p: Cityscape Schools follows the guidance and expertise of national and local health officials to help protect our students and staff from all communicable diseases. While there are no reports of this illness in our area, families are encouraged to visit the CDC website for more information concerning the coronavirus: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html

Please be assured that Cityscape Schools will continue to be in communication with our local sources and stands ready to take all appropriate measures. Cityscape is closely monitoring all developments and is in communication with public health officials.

Cityscape Schools sigue la guía y recomendaciones de los funcionarios de salud nacionales y locales, para ayudar a proteger a nuestros estudiantes y al personal de todas las enfermedades transmisibles. Si bien, no hay reportes de la presencia de este virus en nuestra área, se invita a las familias a visitar el sitio web de los CDC para obtener más información sobre el coronavirus:

Tenga la seguridad de que Cityscape Schools continuará comunicándose con nuestras fuentes locales y está listo para tomar todas las medidas apropiadas. Cityscape sigue realizando un seguimiento de la situación y se mantiene en comunicación constante con los funcionarios de salud pública.

hr.style: color: #211650; font-size: 17.6px; font-family: 'Libre Franklin', sans-serif; text-align: left

div.br:
According to the Texas Department of State Health Services, influenza activity remains high across the state and is above the Texas-specific influenza-like illness baseline. Influenza and cold viruses are spread from person to person through coughing and
sneezing.
At Cityscape Schools, we are monitoring cases by campus and classroom. The district is taking precautions to disinfect these areas more frequently.

El Departamento de Servicios de Salud del Estado de Texas ha mandado comunicación sobre el alto nivel de actividad gripal en el estado de Texas. La gripe y los virus del resfriado se propagan de persona a persona a través de la tos y los estornudos.

div.div: En Cityscape Schools, estamos monitoreando nuestras escuelas y aulas. El distrito está tomando precauciones para desinfectar estas áreas con más frecuencia.

East Grand Preparatory
6211 East Grand Avenue, Dallas, TX 75223
